title: Dan Patrick - Hour 3 -  Najee Harris
itunes:title: Dan Patrick - Hour 3 -  Najee Harris
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Ryan Hollins are filling in for Dan. They discuss the three playoff games last night in the NBA Eastern Conference.  Doug and Ryan talk about the big night that Angels' star Shohei Ohtani had, and why few people care about it. Steelers' Pro-Bowl running back Najee Harris joins the guys to talk about his off-season activities, his charity work and what makes Mike Tomlin a great coach.  Plus, Doug and Ryan react to the breaking news that Ben Simmons is going to make his Sixers' debut in game 4 against Boston.  #DougGottliebShow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
